programs.name: Massage Therapy Program

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Practice techniques on real clients from day one in a professional spa environment.

highlights.label: Small Class Sizes
highlights.description: Personal attention and individualized instruction in an intimate learning setting.

highlights.label: Exam/Career Ready
highlights.description: Graduate with the skills needed to work in spas, wellness centres, or start your own practice or take the exam to become a registered massage therapist.

programs.tagline: Master the art of therapeutic massage
programs.outcome: Become a certified massage therapist ready for professional practice
programs.description: This 7-week Massage Therapy Program trains students to provide Swedish, Deep Tissue, Aromatherapy, and Hot Stone massage while mastering professional workplace skills such as client consultation, workspace sanitization, session preparation, customer service, and retail practices.

capabilities.outcome: Operate **professionally** in a real Massage Therapy environment

competencies.statement: Meet and greet clients professionally
Receive and direct clients appropriately
Conduct client consultation and preparation for therapy
Maintain workspace sanitization, safety, and hygiene
Plan and organize massage therapy work
Deliver quality service and maintain customer relations
Perform interactive workplace communication

capabilities.outcome: Apply **Anatomy and Physiology** knowledge to massage therapy

competencies.statement: Understand the muscular and skeletal system
Apply anatomy and physiology knowledge to massage therapy
Identify muscles used in Swedish, Deep Tissue, and Hot Stone massage

capabilities.outcome: Perform full-body **Swedish Massage** safely and effectively

competencies.statement: Perform effleurage, petrissage, friction, tapotement, and vibration
Deliver a full-body Swedish massage session
Perform Swedish massage using aromatic oils
Maintain client comfort and safe technique during massage

capabilities.outcome: Deliver **Deep Tissue Massage** with appropriate pressure and control

competencies.statement: Understand principles and benefits of deep tissue massage
Apply deep tissue techniques to major muscle groups
Manage client pressure and comfort during deep tissue massage

capabilities.outcome: Perform **Aromatherapy Massage** using essential oils safely

competencies.statement: Understand the fundamentals of aromatherapy
Identify essential oils, their properties, and safety considerations
Blend oils and perform aromatherapy massage safely
Use heated stones safely during massage
Apply proper placement and technique with hot stones
Integrate hot stones with other massage techniques
Deliver a full-body hot stone massage session

capabilities.outcome: Close sessions professionally and support **Post-Treatment Care**

competencies.statement: Close massage sessions professionally
Provide appropriate product recommendations
Provide post-treatment client care guidance
Perform retail and client follow-up procedures

certification.description: Receive a certificate of participation upon successful completion of the program.

testimonials.author: Angella ShandDyer
testimonials.content: I happen to have had first hand experience with this lady as my trainer when i was doing the makeup artistry course. She is very patient and technically sound. Her training techniques definitely moved my skill level up several notches. Thank you Alicia for all the encouragement you gaveâ€¦you made me beleive I could do it ..and I did.

testimonials.author: Rickae Crossman
testimonials.content: Dear Miss Davis, I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for all the support and guidance you've provided throughout this course. Your passion for teaching and dedication to helping us learn has truly made a difference in my experience. Thank you for being patient, approachable, and always willing to help. I've learned so much from you, and I appreciate the effort you put into making our classes engaging and meaningful. Thank you once again for everything! Rickae
